thread.title: 9 Times People Have Advocated Assassinating Donald Trump, and No One Cares
thread.title_full: 9 Times People Have Advocated Assassinating Donald Trump, and No One Cares

author: Bristol Palin
title: 9 Times People Have Advocated Assassinating Donald Trump, and No One Cares
text:
March 28, 2017 by Bristol Palin 
It’s okay now to call for the death of the president of the United States. You know why? Because it’s Donald Trump. 
And the more famous you are, the less serious your death threat is taken. It used to be serious business to threaten the life of the president, but not any more. Celebrities have been doing it all year and no one seems to care. 
Here are 9 times people have advocated for the assassination of President Trump and gotten away with it. 
Click CONTINUE to begin the slideshow:
